+
+// compile-flags:-F private_no_mangle_fns
+
+// FIXME(#19495) no_mangle'ing main ICE's.
+#[no_mangle]
+fn foo() { //~ ERROR function foo is marked #[no_mangle], but not exported
+}
+
+#[no_mangle]
+pub fn bar()  {
+}
+
+fn main() {
+    foo();
+    bar();
+}
